meta.title: From BUZZER to SOUND
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: We're celebrating the upcoming season of "[Make Some  Noise](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKBcWn-tqWE)," which premieres on Monday, October 13. Often the players need to buzz in to play one of the minigames. Frequent guest Jacob Wysocki has taken to committing to his own buzzer sound that's different on each show. [Here's a supercut](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1o_igcJnIGE).

ladder.clue: <> {}, an exciting end to a game
Anagram <> to get a shopping term
Change one letter in <> to make a connection
Drop the outside letters of <>, then reverse, to get a story
Insert a letter in <> to get a piece of furniture
Change a letter in <> to get a fabric
A word for <> that also means to swindle
"{} is <>", it's said (though maybe it shouldn't be)
